mapper.select: SELECT h.hotelNum, p.partnerName, p.partnerTel, hotelName, hotelIntro, hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2 FROM hotel h JOIN partner p ON p.partnerNum = h.partnerNum
SELECT h.hotelNum, hotelName, hotelIntro, hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2, partnerNum FROM hotel h LEFT JOIN hotelImage hI ON h.hotelNum = hI.hotelNum WHERE h.hotelNum = #{hotelNum};
